SectionFormatParseException Class Reference

Exception class for use if a section format is encountered which the DVB codec cannot parse, either due to an error in the DVB codec section grammar or due to an error in the registered section format. More...

#include <decodeexception.hpp>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

 SectionFormatParseException (std::string const &format)

Detailed Description

Exception class for use if a section format is encountered which the DVB codec cannot parse, either due to an error in the DVB codec section grammar or due to an error in the registered section format.
